virtual-sensor.name: Dirruhorn_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerNodeHealthMsg) from Dirruhorn deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, SENSORTYPE, SENSORTYPE_SERIALID, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, PAYLOAD_UPTIME, PAYLOAD_QUEUESIZE, PAYLOAD_CHILDCOUNT, PAYLOAD_FLASHSTATUS, PAYLOAD_PARENTID, PAYLOAD_HOPCOUNT, PAYLOAD_SYSVOLTAGE, PAYLOAD_SDIVOLTAGE, cast(round(PAYLOAD_SIBCURRENT * (2.56/65536) * (10/0.15), 3) as CHAR(30)) as SIBCURRENT, cast(round(CASEWHEN(locate(' sht21:', SENSORTYPE) != 0, -46.85 + 175.72 * PAYLOAD_TEMPERATURE / 16384.0, (0.01*PAYLOAD_TEMPERATURE)-39.63) , 2) as CHAR(30)) as TEMPERATURE, cast(round(CASEWHEN(locate(' sht21:', SENSORTYPE) != 0, -6.0 + 125.0 * PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY / 4096, ((0.01*PAYLOAD_TEMPERATURE)-64.63)*(0.01+(0.00008*PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY))+((0.0405*PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY)-4-(0.0000028*POWER(PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY,2)))) , 1) as CHAR(30)) as HUMIDITY, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_MSPTEMPERATURE=65535,NULL,cast(round((PAYLOAD_MSPTEMPERATURE * (1.5/4095) - 0.986) / 0.00355, 2) as CHAR(30))) as MSPTEMPERATURE from wrapper
